text: Click here for JRF Post Details (15-03-2017) IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Research Associate Posts: Department of Metallurgical and Materials Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Roorkee has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Research Associate vacancies for the project titled of “Enhancement of wear resistance of SiC-WC composites for tribological applications”. Eligible candidates can walk in interview on 17-03-2017 at 03.30 PM. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. IIT Roorkee Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Research Associate Age Limit: Candidates age limit maximum 35 years. Age relaxation is 5 years admissible for SC/ ST/ OBC / Women/ Physically handicapped candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Doctorate (PhD) in Metallurgical and Materials Engineering/ Metallurgy/ Materials Science/ Mechanical Engineering/ Ceramics/ Physics or having 3 years of research, teaching and design & development experience after ME/ M.Tech in Metallurgical and Materials Engineering/ Metallurgy/ Materials Science/ Mechanical Engineering/ Ceramics/ Physics or equivalent. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can attend the interview along with application in a plain paper with detailed CV, experience, attested copies of degree/ certificates, experience certificates, original certificates on 17-03-2017 at 03.30 PM. Venue details are mentioned below. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 17-03-2017 at 03.30 PM. Venue: Office of the Head, Department of Metallurgical and Materials Engineering, IIT Roorkee. For more details like pay-scale, vacancy details & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt - IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for JRF Posts: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Roorkee has given a notification for the recruitment of JRF vacancies for the project entitled ”development of numerical models for entertainment and deposition rates to predict dry out in AHWR fuel bundle”. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 24-03-2017 at 10:00 am. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… IIT Roorkee Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: JRF Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Tech in Chemical/ Mechanical Engg. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications on plain paper with detailed CV including chronological discipline of original & attested copies of degrees/ certificates, experience through mail or by post to the office of the Principal Investigator or may produce at the time of interview on 24-03-2017 at 10 AM in Chemical engg. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 24-03-2017 at 10 AM Venue: Chemical engg. For more details like details like emoluments, job description and other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2017 – JRF Posts: Department of Polymer & Process Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Roorkee has announced a notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow (JRF) vacancies for the project “Solar energy Assisted Multi-effect Distillation System to Produce Drinking Water in India from Contaminated water”. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 15-03-2017 by 05:00 PM. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… . Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Junior Research Fellow (JRF) Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Tech in Chemical Engineering/ Chemical Technology/ Production/ Mechanical/ Industrial/ Environmental/ Mining Engineering with GATE qualification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications on plain paper with detailed CV, self attested copies of relevant certificates to the Office of Principal Investigator on or before 15-03-2017 by 05:00 PM. Last date for Submission of Applications: 15-03-2017 by 05:00 PM. For more details like emoluments, duration & other information click on the link given below….
